VSCode.Cell: # Knowledge Graph + Personality Demo This notebook demonstrates building a simple knowledge graph from text and attaching personality traits to entity nodes.

# Run the demo pipeline from src.kg_personality.kg_builder import KGBuilder from src.kg_personality.personality import PersonalityEstimator
text = open('data/sample.txt').read() kg = KGBuilder() G = kg.build_from_text(text, source_id='note_doc') entities = [n for n in G.nodes() if n.startswith('note_doc_ent_')] pe = PersonalityEstimator() personality = pe.estimate_for_entities(entities) kg.merge_personality(G, personality)
# show nodes for n,d in G.nodes(data=True): print(n, d)
